title: [Caffe2][Feature Request] Sharing scalars between an Op and its GradientOp
body_html:
I am writing an custom Op in caffe2 and couldn't find a way to share scalar information between the forward and backward pass. Right now I would need pass a giant tensor X to GradientOp in order to use its shape X.size().

It would save a lot of memory if we can free X in the forward pass and just share some scalars with the GradientOp.

body:
I am writing an custom Op in caffe2 and couldn't find a way to share scalar information between the forward and backward pass. Right now I would need pass a giant tensor `X` to GradientOp in order to use its shape `X.size()`. 

It would save a lot of memory if we can free `X` in the forward pass and just share some scalars with the GradientOp.
